private: finances — your financial assistant 📊 Exchange rates — enter any currency in the world and get the current rate. Write the currency you want to convert in a format convenient for you and the conversion amount (optional). Or convert* multiple currencies at once by writing several currencies in one message! 💵 Cryptocurrency — use the /crypto command to get cryptocurrency rates to six fiat currencies (hryvnia, dollar, euro, pound, krone, zloty) and convert* it to the desired amount. 📑 Company stocks — review the company stocks you need. 💬 Quickly and conveniently exchange currency rates directly in chats with friends\colleagues thanks to integration into chats. Write: @fStatisticsBot and your desired option. 👥 Add finances to your groups and convert currencies right during the conversation without extra moves and actions. The bot will do everything for you** * — to convert, you need to write the amount in numbers ** — you may need to set it up for yourself in advance
group: finances chat manager — your humble servant in currency conversion 🤖 Automatic conversion of the fiat currencies* you need into any world currencies as you wish. Provide the bot with information about your currency preferences and get automatic conversion without any extra actions**. Convenient and fast * — to review cryptocurrencies, you need to enter the command /crypto (except BTC, ETH) ** — to convert, write the amount in numbers

menu:
⚙️ Settings, choose the option you need:

🤖 Bot — change the list of conversion currencies for fiat, cryptocurrencies, and company stocks
👥 Groups — change the lists of conversion currencies and currencies to be processed.

cryptocurrencies in Telegram, which you can use every second.

main: Explanation of bot functions: 📊 Exchange rates — enter any currency in the world and get the current rate. Write the currency you want to convert in a format convenient for you and the conversion amount (optional). Or convert* multiple currencies at once by writing several currencies in one message! 💵 Cryptocurrency — use the /crypto command to get cryptocurrency rates to six fiat currencies (hryvnia, dollar, euro, pound, krone, zloty) and convert* it to the desired amount. 📑 Company stocks — review the company stocks you need. If you find an error or a problem, please contact me! * — to convert, you need to write the amount in numbers
q&a:
💬 Questions and answers:

Q: The bot says it doesn't understand the N-currency, what should I do?
A: It's hard to support all possible entries and currency names. Try writing the currency code or differently (if you used slang name\your own).
Q: I write the conversion amount and the currencies I want to convert to, but it converts only one or two currencies?
A: The bot's algorithm requires the user to write the conversion amount every time or every other time in such cases.

Have questions? Contact via the button below
